title: Bundler warns of invalid gemspec
body:
With this in my Gemfile:

gem 'devise', :git => 'git://github.com/plataformatec/devise.git', :ref => 'f1a990c2ae51753453b7'

I get the following when running "bundle install":

Using devise (1.1.rc1) from git://github.com/plataformatec/devise.git (at f1a990c) 
devise at /Users/trevorturk/.rvm/gems/ree-1.8.7-2010.02@rails3/bundler/gems/devise-d498cf3a4e1a3fef3f4f071d4feec6a489efe480-f1a990c2ae51753453b7 did not have a valid gemspec.
This prevents bundler from installing bins or native extensions, but that may not affect its functionality.
The validation message from Rubygems was:
  ["lib/generators/devise/devise_generator.rb", "lib/generators/devise/templates/migration.rb", "lib/generators/devise_install/devise_install_generator.rb", "lib/generators/devise_install/templates/README", "lib/generators/devise_install/templates/devise.rb", "lib/generators/devise_views/devise_views_generator.rb"] are not files

Everything seems to work fine, but a warning is shown.
